titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the parish church of Solihull in Warwickshire, December 21. 1690 On occasion of the death of Anne, the wife of the reverend and worshipful Henry Greswold; precentor of the Cathedral of Lichfield, &c. and rector of Solihull aforesaid. By John Wright Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Wright, John, 1665 or 6-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Crooke at the Green-Dragon without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Copy closely trimmed; with some print show-through; MS. note following imprint: "11. May.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
